name: learning-grids
description: Design Grids using popular libraries in CSS3, Less, Sass, Rework and Postcss
author: Priyatam Mudivarti

scripts.build:less: lessc bootstrap/index.less bootstrap/build/index.css && hashmark -s -l 8 -m assets.json dist/main.css 'dist/{name}{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:stylus: stylus assets/styles/main.styl -m -o dist/ && hashmark -s -l 8 -m assets.json dist/main.css 'dist/{name}{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build: npm run build:less && npm run build:sass && npm run build:markup -s
scripts.watch: npm run watch-less & npm run watch-server
scripts.start-less: npm run watch:less & npm run live-server
scripts.start-sass: npm run watch:sass & npm run live-server
